p: We investigate the spatial origins of HIV-1 subtypes in the DRC using reverse transcriptase and protease coding regions sequenced from 346 strains sampled in 2008 from several locations in the country: the capital city of Kinshasa ( n = 80), the port western city of Matadi ( n = 114) and the southern cities of Mbuji-Mayi ( n = 85) and Lubumbashi ( n = 67) ( Table 1, S1 Fig; see the Materials and Methods section). To avoid impact of potential sampling biases on ancestral reconstruction [ 25], discrete trait ancestral reconstructions were performed using three data sets with the same number of taxa from Kinshasa, Matadi and Mbuji-Mayi ( n = 80).
